textBeforeTable: Questions? Contact Drama Coach, Allyson Good at  allyson.poetryoutloud@gmail.com If you need further help finding a monologue, just “google�? monologues. Monologues must be 1-2 minutes and memorized…not read from a paper. http://www.whysanity.net/monos/mlinks.html http://www.bottletreeinc.com/teen_monologues.html http://www.iisd1.org/hs_theatre/monologues.htm Monologue Sites Attempting to live a normal life filled with Jewish traditions in early twentieth century Russia, Tevye, a dairyman, is searching for appropriate husbands for his three eldest daughters �? Tzeital, Hodel and Chava. In a break of tradition, his daughters refuse to accept the wishes of the matchmaker, Yente, and their father. Instead they marry the men that they love. Meanwhile, Russians are instigating terrible pogroms against the Jewish people in Russia. In the end, the Jews of Anatevka are forced to leave their homes and Tevye is determined to start a better life in a new land.
